attributes.action: RECLAIM MONIES PAID BY NORTHERN ROCK TO NEWCASTLE FOOTBALL CLUB
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Newcasle United Football club is being sponsored by Northern Rock building society. Public money is therefore being used to support not only a failed private company but also a premiership football club. I do not pay taxes to support football clubs. 
   I believe that all sponsorship monies paid to Newcastle FC in the name of Northern Rock since the demise should be relaimed.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
